offerUpsellComponent.HEADER_MULTI_UPSELL: (Optional, you may choose one or both)
offerUpsellComponent.OFFER_TERM_SAVE: Start with {{ offerTerm }} Months and Save
offerUpsellComponent.STREAMING_PACKAGE_RTP_PROMO_NON_ZERO: Upgrade to {{ name }} for the same great price, then {{ retailPrice }}/mo.
offerUpsellComponent.ADDITIONAL_COST: Add premium channels plus streaming for an additional {{ price }} per month
offerUpsellComponent.ADDITIONAL_COST_STREAMING: Upgrade to {{ name }} for an additional {{ price }} per month.
offerUpsellComponent.ADDITIONAL_COST_MOSTLY_MUSIC: Get more music channels for an additional {{ price }} per month.
offerUpsellComponent.STREAMING_ADDITIONAL: Lock in your rate for {{ termUpsellAdditionalMonths }} more months.
offerUpsellComponent.TERM_UPSELL_MONTHS: Add {{addMoreMonths}} more months for an additional {{ desiredCurrency }} per month
offerUpsellComponent.TERM_PRICE_DIFFERENCE: Compared to the {{ packageUpsell }}-month deal after {{ term }} months. Based on regular {{ desiredCurrency }}/mo rate. Fees and taxes apply. See offer details.
offerUpsellComponent.UPGRADE_OPTION_DETAILS: Compared to the {{  originalOffer }}-month deal after {{ term }} months. Based on regular {{ retailPrice }}/mo rate. Fees and taxes apply. See offer details.
offerUpsellComponent.PACKAGE_UPSELL: Compared to the {{ packageUpsell.termLength }}-month deal after {{ termPackageUpsell.termLength }} months. Based on regular {{ retailPrice }}/mo rate. Fees and taxes apply. See offer details.
offerUpsellComponent.ORIGINAL_TERM_DETAILS: Get {{ tpu }} months of {{ name }} for {{ priceCheck }}. You'll save {{ upgradedSavings }}
offerUpsellComponent.ORIGINAL_TERM_DETAILS_MCP: Get {{ tpu }} months of {{ name }} for {{ priceCheck }} per month. You'll save {{ upgradedSavings }}
offerUpsellComponent.OFFER_COMPARISION: Compared to the {{ originalOffer }}-month deal after {{ termLength }} months. Based on regular {{ retailPrice }}/mo rate. Fees and taxes apply. See offer details.
